channel.title: Software on ATFutures
channel.description: Recent content in Software on ATFutures

item.title: Software
item.description: Our primary software tools are developed as modular R packages, including: osmdata, a package for very efficient and flexible extraction of data from Open Street Map (OSM). For a description of the package and its functionality, see the vignette. In short, osmdata allows street networks for entire cities to be downloaded and analysed in a few short lines of code and within a few seconds. dodgr (Distances on Directed Graphs in R), a package for highly efficient and scalable routing and allocation of aggregate flows on complex, dual-weighted graphs.
